quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Memento
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, profession. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This 1981 movie was honored with a Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture.

options.text: The Legend of the Lone Ranger

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mommie Dearest

questions.question: What movie won the Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture for 1984?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bolero

questions.question: Which of these movies won the Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture for 1980?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cant Stop the Music

questions.question: What 1983 movie received the Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Lonely Lady

questions.question: Joe Pantoliano and Carrie-Anne Moss starred together in Memento and this sci-fi classic.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Matrix

questions.question: What is the former profession of Leonard, the main character in Memento?

options.text: He used to be an insurance fraud investigator.
He used to be a priest.
He used to be a cop.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He used to be an insurance fraud investigator.

questions.question: What other character, besides Leonard, claims to be suffering from anterograde amnesia in Memento?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sammy Jankis

questions.question: Which Radiohead song did Christopher Nolan want to use in Memento, but couldnt due to insufficient budget?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paranoid Android

questions.question: What year did the movie Guns of the Magnificent Seven hit the screen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1969

questions.question: In Memento, Teddys phone number 555-0134 is identical to the number of which character from the movie Fight Club?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marla Singer

questions.question: The Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Picture for 1982 was awarded to this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Inchon

questions.question: The movie Memento premiered on this film festival.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Venice Film Festival

questions.question: All of the magnificent 7 are killed in the movie Guns of the Magnificent Seven.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of these is not among the tattoos the main character of Memento has on his body?

options.text: “John G. Raped and Murdered My Wife.”

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I loved her very much

questions.question: This actor, who starred in The Man Who Came Back (2007), also played Chris in Guns of the Magnificent Seven.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Kennedy

options.text: I feel like a defective typewriter
But its true! Ive just had the best summer of my life, and now I have to go away
